sentences.english: Tilly brought it, and he put it on her.
sentences.chinese: 蒂莉拿来睡衣，他给她穿上。

sentences.english: Our back opening nightwear is particularly popular for the management of night time incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 我们的背部开睡衣是特别受欢迎失禁时间管理的夜晚。

sentences.english: He was sitting there in striped pyjamas.
sentences.chinese: 他身著条纹睡衣裤坐在那儿。

sentences.english: I bought a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 我买了一件黑色睡衣准备在蜜月时穿。

sentences.english: Do you have the experience to go out in your pajama ?
sentences.chinese: 你有过穿睡衣出去活动的经历吗？

sentences.english: Have flannel PJs replaced your silky negligees?
sentences.chinese: 你的丝质睡裙已经被法兰绒睡衣取代了？

sentences.english: So they were told they could dance, but they must put on their nighties first.
sentences.chinese: 于是告诉他们可以跳舞，不过要先穿上睡衣。

sentences.english: He ran out of the house in his pajamas.
sentences.chinese: 他着睡衣裤，从房子里飞奔了出来。

sentences.english: She bought a black nightie to wear on her honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 她买了一件黑色睡衣准备在蜜月时穿。

sentences.english: One lady had a bathrobe around her. Others just had blankets around them.
sentences.chinese: 一位女士只穿着一件睡衣，其他人只围着一条毯子。

sentences.english: I'd like to have my overcoat dry-cleaned, my shirt and pyjamas laundered and my suit pressed.
sentences.chinese: 我的大衣要干洗，衬衫和睡衣要水洗，并烫一套西服。

sentences.english: She ran out in her pyjamas to tell men who were cutting trees nearby.
sentences.chinese: 穿着睡衣的她，跑到外面告诉正在附近砍树的人们。

sentences.english: People in pajamas were sucking air between their teeth.
sentences.chinese: 穿着睡衣的人们呲着牙。

sentences.english: Her nightdress had slid up above her hips.
Nanon was wonder struck at the sight of a green silk dressing-gown, brocaded with gold flowers in an antique design.
sentences.chinese: 一件金线绣花古式图案的绿绸睡衣，把拿侬看呆了。

sentences.english: The pajamas In lively and light style are comfortable to wear.
sentences.chinese: 活泼轻爽的睡衣睡裤，穿着舒服。
